usefulItems: spring form tin (Ø 24 cm), baking paper, oven
title: Spinach, Tomato and Goat's Cheese Quiche

ingredients.content: 80 g sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C and line a spring form tin (Ø 24 cm) with baking paper.

Place flour, oil, water and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to prepared tin, pushing in using fingertips, then prick with a fork and bake for 10 minutes (200°C). Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl and prepare filling.
Place oil, onions and sun-dried tomatoes in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add spinach and mix <b>1 min/100°C//speed 1<b>, stopping to scrape down halfway through if necessary.
Add milk, eggs, nutmeg, salt and pepper then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Pour over baked base then arrange slices of goat's cheese over the top. Bake for 25-30 minutes (200°C).
